#text=We were running out of milk , so I made a list of other groceries we needed and drove to the store .
#text=I picked out a cart and went down the produce aisle first , picking out bananas and strawberries as I went .
#text=Lettuce , carrots , and zucchini were next on the list .
#text=I wanted to buy ice cream , but was afraid it would melt , so I passed the freezer aisle and went straight for the bread .
#text=It 's nice to have good fresh bread for sandwiches , is n't it ?
#text=Oatmeal would make a good change for breakfast .
#text=Next came the dairy section : yogurt , cheese , butter and eggs were all on the list along with the milk that brought me to the store .
#text=Almost done , I swung back to the freezer aisle to grab that ice cream .
#text=Mmm , they had pralines and cream , yummy !
